body.p: The Sámi Parliament appoints, from amongst its members, an Executive Board. The board includes as members the chair of the Parliament and two vice-chairs, as well as four other members. The Executive Board operates under the Plenum, and its main purpose is to be in charge of political activity and administration, and make preparations for the Plenums.

p.em: The Executive Board of the Sámi Parliament for the years 2020-2023 is:

body.p: Juuso Tuomas Aslak, Chair Koivisto Anni, I vice-chair Aikio Leo, II vice-chair Alakorva Juha-Petteri Feodoroff Veikko Sara Magreta Nuorgam Anne
